title: OpenBucks Cash and Gift Cards
body: Quick post here, and it may seem dumb but when you exchange a gift card code for RP, does it use the whole gift card or can you choose an amount to exchange? I have a $25 Subway gift card but I only need $10 worth of RP.

replies.body: You can select the amount if you don't want to use the entirety of the card.  Be sure to review the [Openbucks ](https://www.google.com/search?q=openbucks+lo+lsupport&rlz=1C1NHXL_enUS727US727&oq=openbucks+lo+lsupport&aqs=chrome..69i57.2545j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8)guide as well to prepare.  I hope that helps with clearing things up.
